p: Unpaired two-tailed Student t-test, Mann–Whitney test and one way ANOVA (Tukey's test for multiple comparisons) were used to determine statistical significance of the difference between data sets. Kaplan–Meier survival curves were analysed by the Log-Rank test for significance. Probability ( p) levels less than 0.05 were considered as significant. All statistical calculations were performed using GraphPad Prism (v7.0) software (RRID: SCR_002798).
